Our Showcase

Cyfair Animal Hostipal

This site was developed using WordPress CMS Platform using the Bootstrap 3 framework, SCSS/CSS3, HTML5, jQuery, & Owl Carousel. This site is mobile responsive and complies to the base standards of on page search engine optimization practices.

Bits & Bytes Computers Site Redesign

This site was built utilizing the Bootstrap framework as well as HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, and some custom javascript. The site is 100% mobile responsive and SEO friendly, and has an intuitive backend that makes updates for the end user simple and easy to understand.

Houston Mixer Repair

Houston mixer repair is a simple one page website with a big call to action. The site currently ranks on the first page for all of it's keywords. Technologies: HTML5 CSS3 PHP

Jonathon Harrelson Personal Site

This site is a custom designed site using the Bootstrap framework and WordPress. It uses HTML5 CSS3, SCSS, jQuery and is 100% responsive for mobile. The background on every page is capable of being a slide show for future use.

Enviable Abode

Enviable Abode is an elegant website utilizing a background image slide show to showcase some finished work. It uses jQuery, HTML5 and CSS3 for aesthetics and functionality. Another satisfied client.

Shane's Westside Auto

We provide quality automotive repair in Katy, Texas. We stand by our service and we have some of the best technicians in the business.

All Things Boutique

An elegant shopping cart system, powered by Magento, for a dress selling boutique based in Houston, TX.

Sunday Dreaming Youth Football Camps

We have begun working with a youth football organization and donating our time and skills to develop their site and an online magazine builder which will be coming in the near future. Their site utilizes the WordPress platform, CSS3, HTML5 , and jQuery. The site is currently under development as the company grows so we are always working on it. We are also creating all the print media for Sunday Dreaming as well.

Zion Home Health Services

This website was created for a Pediatric Home Health Services company here in Houston. It's clean custom WordPress design using jQuery slider and translates from English to Spanish using a Google translator.

Fife Public Adjusters

Fife public adjusters is a clean design using valid xhtml/css and a nice jQuery slider.

Kitty Crunch and Doggy Chow

This is a small simple little site made for a children's book author to sell her book. Its made with valid XHTML and CSS.
